vision_analysis.question_text: What further actions would you expect from a brand that claims to be environmentally responsible?
clickable_elements: Implementing programs to reduce waste throughout their manufacturing and distribution processes
Detailing specific technologies or process improvements used to lower their operational carbon footprint
Providing financial incentives or premiums to producers who adopt advanced sustainable and climate-resilient farming practices
Committing to 100% recyclable, compostable, or reusable packaging for all products
Advocating for stronger environmental policies within their industry or at a governmental level
Actively supporting biodiversity protection and habitat restoration
Implementing and promoting regenerative agriculture practices (e.g. soil health, crop diversity)

automation.question_text:
What further actions would you expect from a brand that claims to be environmentally responsible?

We take responsibility for our environmental impact
For years we have invested in projects that successfully offset and balance our carbon output in our supply chain and operations. We have planted 9 million trees at home and in tea buying communities to take a proactive approach in combatting and mitigating the effects of climate change. We invest in training and materials to ensure that producers can face climate change head on, with farms that are both productive and sustainable, with our focus on a Net Zero approach.

Please select all that apply
